dc:title: What is Happening? Trial Continued Until Nov. 16
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Anecdotes that focus on money, poverty, freedom, encounters with courts, accusations by the city, troublesome guests, and taxes.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 694 1955-11-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
